title: The Wildflower Belt
summary: All it takes to turn the shabbiest jeans or the smartest trousers into the sharpest eye-catching outfit is strapping on this stylish leather belt with your favourite buckle using the interchangable snap on feature. Crafted from rich tan leather, this accessory boasts a hand-brushed, leafy embossed pattern that adds flair to anything you wear. Notice the confidence it brings and enjoy the adventure.

description.p: Despite being over a century old, the Western style outlives any trend in today’s modern fashions and continues to be a popular choice. Donned by Rock Stars, Pop Stars and A-list celebrities, it signifies power, independence and freedom, representing strong iconic values that our culture draws upon. Western fashion is truly timeless.

description.h5: Snap On Feature For Interchangeable Belt Buckles

description.p: Personalise your belt and make it unique. Whether you’re attending a friends birthday, rock concert, or formal event, with our universal snap-on feature you can mix and match different buckles for any occasion. The choice is yours.

Our rich, foliage pattern offers a unique look and feel unlike the everyday belt. With hints of fern, thistle, and acorn patterns, the Wildflower belt's texture has been designed to stand out. Using refined embossing techniques, which not only create the pattern but strengthen the Wildflower Belts leather, it has then been hand-brushed for a rich after effect.

reviews.comment: I can’t recommend this belt enough!
The Wildflower Belt quickly became my favourite accessory.
I love the Wildflower Belts western flavour, embossed pattern and deep brown colour.
